title: Asian Food | MIRASIA FOOD | Romania
text: Asian Food | MIRASIA FOOD | Romania top of page MIRASIA FOOD The best Asian food in Europe For your healthy food OUR BUSINESS “Mirasia Food S.R.L is a leader in the import, trade, and distribution of retail and wholesale food from Korea in Romania. Our main target is to become the most respected company. For this reason, we concentrate our efforts for the satisfaction of the customers, and promote Korean and Asian food in all European local markets. We are engaged with the selection of best quality, providing a variety of products, and fast and reliable distribution.” OUR BRANDS ROLLING SUSHI GURI GURI GANGNAM POCHA PRODUCTS Our company directly imports goods from brands such as Bibigo, Samyang, Namyang, and other popular Korean food brands. View more Working With the Best Partners Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful. Albert Schweitzer bottom of page

title: Consali Expert Srl - Importer, Distributor, Online Store
text: Consali Expert Srl - Importer, Distributor, Online Store Login Request Demo DEMO Consali Expert Srl www.asianfood.ro Asian Food is a Romanian company specializing in the import and distribution of authentic Asian ingredients and products. They offer a wide selection of items, including sauces, noodles, rice, and spices, catering to both culinary enthusiasts and professional chefs. The company emphasizes quality and authenticity in their offerings, ensuring customers have access to traditional flavors from various Asian cuisines. With a user-friendly online platform, Asian Food makes it easy for customers to explore and purchase a diverse range of products. Their mission is to provide a taste of Asia, transforming cooking experiences in Romania. title: Asian Food Group - Connecting Asian food within Europe.
text: Asian Food Group - Connecting Asian food within Europe. This website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Accept Online Store Online Store Where flavours connect and stories unfold Reliable and innovative More than 80 years of experience As Asian Food Group, we are a bridge uniting cultures through authentic and inspiring Asian cuisine. Our mission is clear, to introduce authentic flavors to Europe by inspring our partners and enriching the experiences of our customers. Our aspiration is to be the preferred Asian Â (non-) food supplier. About us Step in to our world Blending heritage with innovation Together with our partners, we are dedicated to continuously improving our services. Driven by entrepreneurial spirits, we support growth opportunities, through data and adding value to our relationships. â Our diverse team, fluent in over 13 languages, ensures tailored advice and customer service, striving to understand and fulfill our partners' needs. Finding inspiration together through meaningful connections. We help businesses to be successful in todays competitive world. Get in touch + 25 exclusive a-brands + 3500 different products in stock + 35 countries we distribute to Reach out e: info@asianfoodgroup.com t: +31 (0)88 221 2000 Asian food group contact news assortment customers services about us asian food group history mission vision company video terms & conditions disclamer cookie policy privacy policy Wambay
